short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension that shows the sentiment of a product based on the comments on HN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a new way to verify new products.

Click on the extension on any site, and know if you can trust it.

Reviews you can trust, sourced from your peers.
